name: SonarQube
description: SonarQube is a Code Quality Assurance tool that collects and analyzes source code.

name: Xray Test Management
description: Xray is a complete Test Management tool for Jira. It is a full-featured app that does not require any other software in order to run.

name: PACT
description: Pact is a code-first contract testing tool, which requires access to the code on both sides of an integration point.

name: AXE
description: AXE is an open-source accessibility testing tool used to identify accessibility issues in web applications.

name: Browserstack
description: Browser Stack is a cloud-based testing tool. Using this tool, developers and testers can do the cross-browser testing of various web and mobile applications in different web browsers.

name: WAVE
description: WAVE is a suite of evaluation tools that helps authors make their web content more accessible to individuals with disabilities.

name: Postman
description: POSTMAN is an API client used to develop, test, share and document APIs.

name: Appium
description: Appium is an open-source framework that allows QAs to conduct automated app testing on different platforms like Android, iOS, and Windows.

name: Flood.io with Element
description: Flood IO is a load testing platform that executes globally-distributed performance tests from open source tools.

name: Flood.io with JMeter
description: Flood IO is a load testing platform that executes globally-distributed performance tests from open source tools.

name: PactumJ - Typescript/JavaScript
description: PactumJS is a test framework focused on API testing.

name: RestAssured - Java
description: REST Assured is a Java package used to test and validate Restful Web Services.

name: Serenity BDD - Java
description: Serenity BDD is a framework and open source library for the creation of automated software testing for code in development

name: Playwright - Typescript/JavaScript
description: Playwright is a framework for Web Testing and Automation. It allows testing Chromium, Firefox and WebKit with a single API

name: Shift-Left approach
description: The Shift Left approach intends to identify and resolve bugs as early as possible in the development process

name: Exploratory Testing
description: Exploratory testing is the practice of allowing testers to enter a product and find bugs and errors without the help of a script or test cases

name: Performance Testing
description: Performance testing is the practice of evaluating how a system performs in terms of responsiveness and stability under a particular workload

name: Automation Testing
description: Automated testing is a software testing technique that automates the process of validating the functionality of software and ensures it meets requirements before being released into production

name: Behavior-Driven Development (BDD)
description: BDD is a software development process that goes well with agile software development process that encourages collaboration among developers, quality assurance experts, and customer representatives in a software project.
